name: chef
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A2 a skilled and trained cook who works in a hotel or restaurant, especially the most important cook: He is one of the top chefs in Britain. She is head chef at the Waldorf Astoria.
Eric Audras/ONOKY/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesThat was an excellent meal! My compliments to the chef.Shapur's restaurant now has an excellent new young chef Glyn Fussell.The head chef runs the hotel kitchen with strict discipline and efficiency.He's not exactly a master chef - he makes out the orders at the local burger bar.A couple of the kitchen staff are on holiday so I'm having to be chef tonight.
